nodes.text: A cargo hauler was a type of speeder equipped with a large cargo bed. One such vehicle was used by the Serpent Masters on the planet Ophideraan. When the group was defeated by Tanith Shire and Luke Skywalker, Shire took the vehicle as her own and used it to ferry Skywalker back to his Rebel friends on Kabal.

During the Force psychosis crisis, a pilot and three bounty hunters—Vrannin Vaxx, Dhidal Nyz, and a blond Human female—used a cargo hauler during the hunt for the fugitive Jedi Knight Valin Horn on Coruscant in 43.5 ABY. It was later used again by Nyz in partnership with bounty hunter Zilaash Kuh during the raid on the Armand Isard Correctional Facility.
